Commands.Snakebite & Lash: 4-HIT BRV attack.  Inflicts one stack of Snakebite on the target for 6 turns (max stacks is 3).  Snakebite reduces Defense based on the number of stacks and allows Snakebite & Lash to deal higher damage.  If Snakebite is inflicted on another target, the debuff is removed from the original target.
Commands.Elementalash: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Turn to a 3-HIT BRV+HP attack if STR 60 Passive Ability is equipped.
Commands.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 2 turns when an enemy is afflicted with debuffs  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

Passives.Snakebite & Lash Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Snakebite & Lash.
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Start Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 3 turns when the battle starts.
Passives.Elementalash Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Elementalash.
Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Snakebite & Lash Charge: Increases the max uses of Snakebite & Lash by 1.
Passives.Debuff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Elementalash Charge: Increases the max uses of Elementalash by 1.
Passives.All-Seeing Eye: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense while an enemy is afflicted with Snakebite.
Passives.Debuff Attack&Speed Up: Slightly raises Attack and Speed while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Snakebite & Lash Extend: Greatly raises the potency of Snakebite & Lash.BRV stolen from the target can overflow up to 150% of Max BRV.After the final hit of Snakebite & Lash, if BRV exceeds 100% of Max BRV, an HP attack is triggered.Lowers Action Delay if target is broken.
Passives.Debuff Attack&Boost Up: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Elementalash: Increases the max uses of Elementalash by 1.Increases its number of hits to 3.Tremendously raises its total potency.Grants Small Attack Up for 6 turns.Lowers Action Delay if target is broken.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 6 turns after using Elementalash.BRV Attack+ is a 1-HIT Fire/ice/Thunder elemental BRV attack.
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Debuff Attack Up Extend: When using  Debuff Attack Up :- Slightly improves Attack Up effect

Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Debuff Attack Up  use +1Duration of  Debuff Attack Up  effects +2 turns
Weapons.Silver Whipblade CP: 15: Raises the potency of Snakebite & Lash.Grants Small Max BRV Up for 6 turns.
Weapons.Platinum Whipblade CP: 35: Raises the potency of Elementalash.Inflicts Small Speed Down on target for 4 turns.If the enemy is afflicted by Snakebite, Elementalash will strike again.
